meanings.definition: To go from one place to another, typically over a distance.
meanings.sent1: I love to travel to new countries and explore different cultures.
meanings.sent2: People often travel by plane when they go on vacation.
meanings.sent3: The adventurous cat decided to travel across the backyard to chase a butterfly.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts would travel to distant memories like a time machine.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the train whistle made the idea of travel seem exciting and full of possibilities.

meanings.sent1: My dream job involves a lot of travel to exotic locations.
meanings.sent2: She enjoys the thrill of travel and discovering new places.
meanings.sent3: The travel of the ball across the field was swift and impressive.
meanings.sent4: His mind was a constant whirlwind of travel, always seeking new adventures.
meanings.sent5: The travel of the river through the valley created a beautiful landscape.
